A

a - Static variable in class metro.Graphics.Fill
 
ActionObservable - Class in metro.WindowControls
Every window control (or other classes) should inherit this class to be able to send information about state changes, button clicks, etc. to other classes in a clean and simple way.
ActionObservable() - Constructor for class metro.WindowControls.ActionObservable
Creates the list of all observers of this observable object.
ActionObserver - Class in metro.WindowControls
Who ever wants to be able to get information about state changed, button clicks, etc. of window controls, should implement this interface.
ActionObserver() - Constructor for class metro.WindowControls.ActionObserver
 
add(RailwayNode) - Static method in class metro.TrainManagement.Nodes.RailwayNodeOverseer
Adds a node to the map of nodes.
addActionObservations() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.MainMenu
Creates anonymous inner classes for all buttons (using ActionObserver system) to do their specific action.
addButtonObserver() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.GameScreen.InGameMenuWindow
Creates observer for all buttons ("yes", "no" and "settings").
addButtonObserver() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.GameScreen.SettingsWindow
Adds the observer for the "ok" button that closes the window.
addButtonObserver() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.TrainView.TrainViewMain
Creates all needed observers for the buttons.
addCheckboxObserver() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.GameScreen.SettingsWindow
Creates the observer with sub-classes for all the check-boxes of this class.
addColorBarObserver() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.LineView.LineView
Creates the observer for the color bar.
addControlElement(ControlElement) - Method in class metro.WindowControls.Window
Adds a new control to the window control list.
addCreateLineButtonObserver() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.LineView.LineView
Creates the action listener for the "Create line"-Button.
addEditButtonObserver() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.LineView.LineView
Creates the listener for the edit button.
addElement(String) - Method in class metro.WindowControls.List
Adds an element to the list control.
addLine(TrainLine) - Method in class metro.TrainManagement.TrainManagementService
Adds a train line to the list of lines.
addListObserver() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.GameScreen.SettingsWindow
Add observer for all lists (resolution, samples and segments)
addMessageLabelObserver() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.LineView.LineView
Creates an observer for the message label.
addMoney(int) - Method in class metro.GameState
Add an specific amount of money to the players account.
addNeighbor(RailwayNode) - Method in class metro.TrainManagement.Nodes.RailwayNode
Adds a node to the List of neighbors.
addRemoveLineButtonObserver() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.LineView.LineView
Create the action observer for the "Remove line"-button.
addSaveButtonObserver() - Method in class metro.GameScreen.LineView.LineView
Create the action observer for the "Save"-button Creates a new train line and saves it correctly.
